column5: April 18th to May 9th, 2015  Noticed their "magazine" was at the Beer Store today. Wasn't all I picked up, but just an FYI about the 31 page booklet on what's going on and some local shops deals during the contest.  This years Adult grand prize is a Lund Rebel XL Sport with 50Hp Merc, Lowrance locator, Bow Trolling motor and custom trailer.
24 bottles of Holi water I suspect made their way in the truck!
I'll be there with my kids!
I keep meaning to enter, but never seem to find the time   Maybe this will be the year....  Maureen
Hopefully the ice will be gone by then.  I've seen a few times the only place to launch was right in the Narrows. Early Bird tickets available until April 12th.
I just might attend this year. Row out in the toon. No launch required.
I just might attend this year. Row Walk out on the ice out in the toon. No launch required.  Fixed it.
I just might attend this year. Row out in the toon. No launch required. Hey that's cheating.
I'll be out again this year, last year it was pretty well iced until the 3rd weekend, might be the same this year
I can remember spending the first 2 weeks of Perchfest icefishing

I was able to get to Orillia 2 different times last year.  The first trip was cold, rainy & windy - not much fun.  2nd trip 10 days later was awesome, much warmer & the fish were co operating.  42 nice perch in about 3 hours!
Went for the first time last year and had a great time! Discovered how nice the people are in Orillia. Kept going back to fish even after the festival was over. Can't wait to go back there!

Never missed it, most of us have caught a few tags each Plus my buddy won the Grand prize a few years ago. What away to spend the beginning of the fishing year. Our group fishes it 8 to 9 days of the derby and we come from the Hammer. Have lots of stories, but what happens in Orillia, stays in Orillia Just a few pictures out of hundreds                          And after a hard days battling ice and fish.
Great memories for you Dave. Too many fish down there....really buggered up your prop.
wow...look at that prop...u guys r NUTS!! =)
Dave, you & your buds deserve every fish you catch.

Thanks guys and to think us fools will be back doing the same thing this year. Man, it be nice to have a meet and greet at the festival. we could fill the Hywayman Motel with the OFC.  Make sure to bring a spare Prop
